short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the AI based browsing tools powered by ChatGPT and Enhance your web surfing like never before!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to switching between tabs to copy-pasting in chatGpt, and streamline your workflow!"

This tool is designed to facilitate easy selection of text on a webpage and get an AI-powered response. With this extension, users can highlight any text on a webpage and simply right-click to access a context menu that provides the option to "Get AI response." Clicking on this option opens a pop-up window that displays the AI-generated response to the selected text.

The extension can be configured to use different AI models depending on the user's preference or the type of text being selected. The AI models used can range from natural language processing (NLP) models for analysing text sentiment, language translation models for translating text into different languages, or even image recognition models for analysing images embedded in the text.

Overall, the chrome extension provides a quick and convenient way to leverage AI to analyse and respond to text on webpages, making it a valuable tool for users looking to streamline their research or improve their productivity.
